main event: A sighting of a whitish blob with a slight tail was reported near Corvallis, Oregon on June 20, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a quarter., The object had a tail that seemed to drop off the main body., The sighting lasted for 10-15 seconds., It was noted that the object disappeared slightly to the left of sight., The explanation given was that it was probably a meteor.
sighted object: whitish blob with a slight tail
